name: v0.6.2
body:
## What's Changed
* clarifying how errors should be returned during remove container operâ€¦ by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/268
* Update bootconfig.proto by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/257
* Update build to support Bazel 8/bzlmod by @bstoll in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/248


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2

name: v0.6.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump bazelbuild/setup-bazelisk from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/245
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.36.1 to 1.36.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/246
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.69.2 to 1.69.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/247
* [containerz]: make image_size required by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/230
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.69.4 to 1.70.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/255
* Bump github.com/openconfig/gnsi from 1.7.0 to 1.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/251
* Adding options for custom volume plugins by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/254
* add custom volume driver enum by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/259
* Update StartContainer RPC for containerz.proto by @skomajwa in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/262
* Added support for devices in StartContainerRequest by @gpollep in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/264

## New Contributors
* @skomajwa made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/262
* @gpollep made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/264

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump openconfig/common-ci from 125b6b58286d116b216e45c33cb859f547965d61 to 66c8f8f6a58d5f9c9e84efe89f542b08cb6a0a33 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/201
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.34.1 to 1.34.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/202
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.64.0 to 1.65.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/205
* Bump github.com/openconfig/gnsi from 1.4.5 to 1.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/206
* Deprecate gnoi cert service by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/208
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.65.0 to 1.67.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/215
* Add bootconfig to Activate.  This allows the caller to provide by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/218
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.34.2 to 1.35.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/217
* fix pb.go files by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/219
* Update go.yml by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/220
* Ignore deprecated warnings in staticcheck configuration. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/232
* Adding metadata to container listing by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/225
* Adding limits to container start operations by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/234
* Update dependencies. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/242
* Bump github.com/openconfig/gnsi from 1.6.0 to 1.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/236
* Update ci-cpp-build-gnoi.yml by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/243
* adding support for plugins by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/238


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.4.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Adding support for volumes in containerz by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/162
* change "types" target for healthz by @rlucus in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/174
* Bump github.com/golang/protobuf from 1.5.3 to 1.5.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/176
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.59.0 to 1.62.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/178
* Add bazelversion into repo to make the bazel version by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/172
* Bump actions/cache from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/158
* Bump github.com/openconfig/bootz from 0.1.1 to 0.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/167
* Fix import paths and regen code by @DanG100 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/180
* Bump github.com/openconfig/bootz from 0.2.1 to 0.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/182
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.62.1 to 1.63.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/184
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.20.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/185
* Bump github.com/openconfig/gnsi from 1.2.5 to 1.4.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/187
* Bump github.com/openconfig/bootz from 0.3.0 to 0.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/189
* Readd grpc.pb.go based on compiler standardization in OC repos by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/190
* Add README to containerz by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/191
* fix copy in regenerate-files script by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/194
* Bump github.com/openconfig/gnsi from 1.4.3 to 1.4.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/192
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.33.0 to 1.34.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/193
* Update README.md to indicate expected ArtifactResponses by @mymanchan in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/195
* Deprecate bootconfig certz message to align with bootz by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/197

## New Contributors
* @rlucus made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/174
* @DanG100 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/180
* @mymanchan made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/195

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1

name: v0.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Adds auto_restart to containerz.StopRequest. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/139
* Create dependabot.yml by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/140
* Bump openconfig/common-ci from c2294c3c86c90e75e58c24a40d6f7f3364bbae9d to 125b6b58286d116b216e45c33cb859f547965d61 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/141
* Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/142
* Bump actions/cache from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/143
* [System] Clarify fields in the SwitchControlProcessorResponse by @hellt in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/114
* Clarify VerifyResponse version string by @dplore in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/122
* system: add icmp_ext_data field to TracerouteResponse by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/117
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.30.0 to 1.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/144
* Bump plexsystems/protolint-action from 0.3.0 to 0.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/145
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.56.3 to 1.59.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/146
* Create Debug gNOI service for interacting with devices for debugging by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/147
* Update grpc bazel library and rerun gazelle by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/148
* Adding information about image and container purging by containerz service by @alshabib in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/152
* fix Workspace by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/157
* Add gNOI API to access Boot config namespace in Bootz by @xw-g in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/156
* Update ci-cpp-build-gnoi.yml by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/164
* Fix build imports by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/171
* Update bootconfig.proto new by @sachendras in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/168

## New Contributors
* @xw-g made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/156

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Checkin gnoi to new openconfig repo by @marcushines-zz in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/1
* File by @marcushines-zz in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/2
* squash! Update system set package to use streaming rpc Update build fâ€¦ by @marcushines-zz in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/4
* Add generated go files by @marcushines-zz in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/3
* fix markdown by @marcushines-zz in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/5
* Gnoi by @marcushines-zz in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/6
* SetPackage support for remote downloads by @ejbrever in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/8
* Fix references in gNOI protos; cleanup. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/7
* First cut of Diag gNOI micro service by @aghaffarkhah in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/9
* Fixed an include issue for diag.proto by @aghaffarkhah in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/12
* Support remote download of files when doing a File.Get by @ejbrever in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/11
* Add a simplified security model by @samribeiro in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/15
* Fix build and add gNOI versions. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/16
* Add optical.proto service with InitiateOTDR by @ejbrever in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/20
* Add wavelength_router service and migrate optical service to otdr service. by @ejbrever in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/24
* Add OTDR configuration for sampling resolution by @ejbrever in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/27
* Bootstrapping gNOI/gNMI using the gNOI cert service by @samribeiro in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/18
* IANA reserved port for gNOI/gNMI by @samribeiro in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/26
* gNOI best practices by @samribeiro in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/25
* Add required validation to new Certificates by @samribeiro in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/23
* Suggest order in gNOI cert ca_certificates by @samribeiro in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/22
* gNOI OS - service that provides an interface for OS installation on a Target by @samribeiro in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/19
* PSD to Spectrum Power units change by @ejbrever in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/30
* gNOI Factory Reset - service for factory resetting a Target by @samribeiro in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/17
* Fix syntax errors in reset.proto by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/36
* Updates to cert service to separate operations by @aashaikh in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/41
* Migrate from Travis-CI to GitHub actions. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/46
* Move to using protolint. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/49
* Added the 'no_reboot` flag to the ActivateRequest message. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/51
* Creation of healthz service for gNOI by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/48
* Adding bazel C++ build support for gNOI repository by @vamsipunati in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/52
* compile protos with factory_reset included by @greg-dennis in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/55
* Add source_address field to common.RemoteDownload. by @kefanman in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/57
* Add a gNOI operation to restart an OS process. by @greg-dennis in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/56
* Update system proto to address by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/61
* update gnoi deps to fix build by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/62
* Update workflow to use 1.17 by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/63
* add packet_link_qualification by @yushiyushi in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/68
* Update packet_link_qualification.proto by @yushiyushi in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/70
* Add do_not_lookup_asn flag to TracerouteRequest by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/69
* Add clarification on permission encoding. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/78
* Add markdown version of gNOI `Healthz` document. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/76
* Update healthz based on design doc by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/79
* Add cron schedule and coverage upload to coveralls by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/80
* add packet_link_qualification markdown and update to v2 spec. by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/81
* Update index.md by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/82
* Update packet_link_qualification.proto by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/83
* Update index.md by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/84
* added protobuf syntax highlighting for gnoi.healtz streaming design doc by @hellt in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/88
* add os package to compile_protos.sh by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/89
* Clarify ping RPC expected behavior by @bstoll in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/85
* gnoi.Healthz: fix typo `healthly->healthy` by @hellt in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/94
* fix typo - s/aftar/after by @toransahu in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/29
* Update go.yml by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/97
* Fix build rules for bazel by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/96
* Update linter.yml by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/98
* os: add package_size to TransferRequest  by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/90
* Update Protos by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/104
* Linted gNOI.LinkQualification service proto by @hellt in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/107
* Update healthz documentation. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/106
* Update generated protobufs. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/108
* Clarify how os.Verify reports UNAVAILABLE by @liulk in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/113
* installing the package in one command on all Supervisors. by @ramesh700 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/112
* Update compiled protos that were out of date by @liulk in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/116
* cleanup of gNOI Packet Link Qualification service readme by @hellt in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/109
* Add support for SIGABRT to KillProcessRequest_Signal, allow gNOI to generate coredumps by @aredmon8551 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/105
* Target does zeroize while maintaining certificates. by @ramesh700 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/118
* Remove interface service based on no implementations nor no clear use by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/121

## New Contributors
* @marcushines-zz made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/1
* @ejbrever made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/8
* @aghaffarkhah made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/9
* @samribeiro made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/15
* @brianneville made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/36
* @aashaikh made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/41
* @tomek-US made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/51
* @marcushines made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/48
* @vamsipunati made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/52
* @greg-dennis made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/55
* @kefanman made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/57
* @yushiyushi made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/68
* @hellt made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/88
* @bstoll made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/85
* @toransahu made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/29
* @liulk made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/113
* @ramesh700 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/112
* @aredmon8551 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/pull/105

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnoi/commits/v0.1.0
